newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: STEERS SHARES ISSUE RAISES 12.36 MLN RAND.
newsitem.headline: STEERS SHARES ISSUE RAISES 12.36 MLN RAND.

text.p: South African restaurant chain Steers Holdings Ltd said on Monday that it had raised 12.36 million rand by an isssue of 2.7 million new ordinary shares and a simuilar anmount of new "N" shares.
The cash is to go to settle an initial one million rand payment in the buy of the Speciality Franchising Trust and fund future retail outlet buys, the firm said.
